action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,


We would like to make some design updates to the carpet color variants in the Acouflor website. See the attached file for the mockup.


  • Layout of carpet collection name and color (refer to page 1 and page 3)
  • Updating and simplifying the look of the icons
    • Make the add to cart as the first one to appear
    • Added download button which would instantly download the carpet scan
    • Added the magnifying glass icon which would enlarge the carpet scan and ensure that it pops straight away rather than the screen scrolling up to the top of the page (refer to pages 2 and 4)
      • Right now it scrolls up, see example here when you click download scan in one of the carpet colors (Flinders https://acouflor.com.au/carpet-tiles/acoustic-flinders-carpet-tiles/#)
  • When you click the carpet scan, it would also open to the enlarged version of the tile, similar to what it looks like when you click the magnifying glass




NEW DESIGN





CURRENT DESIGN





Let me know if you have any questions.


Thank you!




Warm regards,
Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager
T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com
